name: test_e2e_with_logs[107_PATH_ABS_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_ABS_007` |
| **Name** | Apache htaccess file access |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | absolute_paths |
| **Severity** | `MEDIUM` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/var/www/html/.htaccess`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fvar%2Fwww%2Fhtml%2F.htaccess`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results
